code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Map from'./Map';import'./PetDetails.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PetDetails=_ref=>{let{match}=_ref;const{id}=match.params;const[pet,setPet]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch(`/api/pet/${id}`).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setPet(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching pet details:',error));},[id]);if(!pet)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading pet details..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pet-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:pet.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:pet.photo,alt:pet.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:pet.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Map,{location:pet.location})]});};export default PetDetails;
